column3:
â€œFind this a good strain. Good pain relief and strong feeling of arousal. Also found strain to have a mellow flavor, unlike its mother strains. 
 I find this strain is good for: Pain relief, anxiety, Intimacy issues 
 I found the following bad effects of this strain to be:  Dry mouth and eyes.

Overall I find the strain's positive effects to outweigh the negative effects. Mild taste and smell (as marijuana goes) ...â€

â€œOne of my top 10.  this strain can cut through an OG Kush high and send you up another 2 notches without added paranoia which is a testament to its strength and quality.  it lacks a little in the taste department but thats it.  4.5 which rounds to 5 starsâ€

â€œhybrid of well, you guessed it: hindu and skunk. this makes a great hybrid with some of the best of both worlds. really great for a couch potato who needs to get some exercise. perfect for a nice wake 'n bake or a dog walk. Or both!â€

â€œThis weed when broken up has a very sweet skunk scent but when smoked become pretty earthy/dirt tasting. The high is an amazing one with sativa like effects on your body but indica like effects on your mind. An odd one, but i can dig it. 3.5/5â€

â€œMan oh man oh man....I grabbed some of this at a low price, so I expected some bunk. I'm glad I grabbed as much as I did, because this is some of the best MMJ I've had in a while. I smoke frequently throughout the day and my optimism peaks every time I do. The flavor is dynamic and full, and as I stated previously, the effects are second to none. One of my new favorites.â€

â€œThe smell when cut-up is a musky ammonia dankness. Nice moderate citrus taste, with notes of lemon candy and menthol.
Effects are relaxing, and mildly trippy, with tingly  sensations between the legs during vape session, before settling into a nice body high.â€
â€œGreat great strain loved it, honestly had a sweet type of smell to it maybe that was just my grinder but it also tasted pretty nice tooâ€

â€œI've been growing this strain for over a year now. Picked up a cutting from a local dispensary. Hindu Skunk is a pleasure to grow; relatively quick finisher with big, dense, sugar coated buds. The dried buds don't smell very skunky to me. More of a light floral or fruity aroma with hints of spice. Hindu Skunk never disappoints. The first inhale goes straight to the dome, sending you soaring.  Just when you think you ...â€
â€œPiney smell with a smilar taste to accompany it. Really chill body high with some sativa influence to help you space.â€

â€œI have to smoke outside because this weed smells so strongly of SKUNK! The high is a very mellow head high, making you sleepy and hungry! It's an interesting high but great! The high can feel almost trippy, with tingling sensations in the legs! A great strain to smoke before bed to relax and sleep.â€
â€œvery potent bud ! I'm a heavy smoker and I don't need much with this to medicate. I'm a huge fan and I would get it againâ€

â€œWhen I smoke this, I have to stand as close as possible to an open window because this strain REEKS.  Great for stimulating appetite, never been hungrier. Coming down I get overwhelmed with exhaustion, best used towards the end of the dayâ€

â€œOne of my top 10 favorite strains.  Beautiful flower, well manicured, I donated to Blossom Delivery and they delivered the bomb medicine.  I'm treating my bipolar medicinally through cannabis and this one is great to calm me down when I'm too anxious or manic.  Lovely lovely and relaxing.  A couple hits (i have high tolerance) is enough to do the trick, too many hits and I fall asleep-which is never a bad thing for m...â€

â€œSmooth delightful and potent.  This would be great for anything cannibis related including headache relief, creative thought, relaxation, appetite augmentation.  A really great all around variety.  I would make this my choice most of the time.â€

â€œSmooth delightful and potent.  This would be great for anything cannibis related including headache relief, creative thought, relaxation, appetite augmentation.  A really great all around variety.  I would make this my choice most of the time.â€

â€œGood indica strain. I've got a total head high without couch lock. It does have an ammonia or at least pungent smell to the bud. Once I lit it up it was smooth and mellow. I am significantly hungrier than I was beforehand. In a fan.â€

â€œThe way the hybrid slowly works its way from sativa to indica is great.  It helps get things done before the indica's effects really hit.  Great for muscle spasms and the pain that goes hand in hand.â€

â€œOne of my top 10 favorite strains.  Beautiful flower, well manicured, I donated to Blossom Delivery and they delivered the bomb medicine.  I'm treating my bipolar medicinally through cannabis and this one is great to calm me down when I'm too anxious or manic.  Lovely lovely and relaxing.  A couple hits (i have high tolerance) is enough to do the trick, too many hits and I fall asleep-which is never a bad thing for m...â€

â€œThis is by far the best strain I've ever had. It left me laying on the couch unable to function while I laughed at everything. You can easily feel the indica and the sativa equally with this awesome hybrid.â€

â€œReally great hybrid for anxiety disorder.  Gives me a wonderful head full of ideas, but not as speedy as a straight sativa.  I went out with the in laws and they didn't know i was high and i wasn't paranoid about being in public (which is already a prob with SAD).  Great uplifting effect i'm saving a small stash for those days of pms, depression, or sudden anxiety attacks.â€
â€œEarly afternoon to late evening. This strain is perfect. light and airy head space and a deep relaxation as if your bones and muscles arenâ€™t quite solid. . But with no couch lock to speak of.â€
â€œProvided great relaxation, smooth perspectives and a sensual libido.â€

â€œI give it a 9/10 *high bud to stem keeps it from 10/10*

It has that perfect slightly indica dominant 60/40 high which i really like for adhd. The smell is amazingly similar to hindu kush but after squeezing the nugs or at least after exhale you can taste that cheesy skunk smell from the cross which gives it a nice light sativa buzz. A bit stony for a wake n bake imo, but for anything else its great stuff. Downside...â€
â€œVery effective strain with a great aroma and flavorâ€
â€œFelt it off the first rip of the bong very mellow and relaxing and Im a heavy indica smoker myself.â€
â€œsmells bomb......smokes to the head!â€

â€œAlthough I had been drinking some beers and had already smoked a few other strains, I could instally tell the difference that was Hindu Skunk.
It was like I finally hit that Oh
column4: now I'm high" feeling. Very heavy and very happy. Loved it all and slept very well that evening.â€"

column3:
â€œfirst strain i tried once i got my medical referral. smelled skunky with a hint of that Hindu Kush tangy sweetness. tasted fruity with a hint of that skunky-ness. the smoke was slightly harsh, but feels good in the lungs and excellent on the exhale. 

this strain kept me uppity. i felt really creative and read a whole textbook all week about the basics of barbell training. good for just  a gram of dank meds. 

mu...â€

â€œBurns little quick to my liking, but overall a good clean high that's not overwhelming but definitely won't let you down. Would recommend for use when going out and about your day. It definitely doesn't drag you down and allows you to be medicated without being obvious if that's important to you.â€
â€œawesome strainâ€
â€œgreat stress relief, relaxing. a bit couchy.â€
â€œGood strain. It has a sweet flavor and a potent high. Love smoking it while watching some Netflix. Feel very relaxed but not super drowsy. Defiantly need some snacks though...â€
â€œbig smell on exhale. Real big. smoke outside. stuck to my clothes. nice head change. go for a walk or you will couch lock.â€
â€œTHIS. IS. SOME. SERIOUSLY. GOOD. CANNABAIS!!!!! I'm floating right now.â€
â€œgood strain and the smell is even better, stink for days.â€

â€œFirst batch had a heavy skunk aroma. Latest has more of an orange zest aroma. Not a memorable flavor, basic skunk that rewards a big hit with a coughing fit. For now, this is my favorite...it's gotten me thru withdrawal from 17 years of morphine! Not great for chronic pain, but I'm still experimenting. Limited choices in rural MN.â€
â€œSex Inhancerâ€
â€œFeel really excited in the beginning then....BAM couchlock harddddd. Awesome for just passing out after a tough day.â€

â€œHindu Skunk will put you on your azz like Swifty's 1 shot macro.Berries and skunk last very long time have to mix up w/ CBD flower to even thing's out so not so couched locked.
Pick it up for pain or insomnia winner for sure this strain has stood the test of time for the reason.
More inclined to use this strain at night myself everybody is different though.
Full body melt NL high pogchamp kappaâ€

â€œNice buzz, but a bit lazy . Great for migraines and anxiety when you have the jitters. Insomnia patients would like this too, because it calms you down to a tired state of mind.â€
â€œUnrealâ€
â€œGreat smoke, very smooth. Earthy spicy smell with fruity undertones. Exhale is like the smell spicy but fruity. Definitely a heavy strain but definitely a new favorite!â€
â€œLike it's parent strains this one is very effective for pain relief as well as stress. Makes me hungry, and sleepy too. So very nice night time weed.â€

â€œStrain: Hindu Skunk
Type: Indica-dominant (70% Indica)
Genetics: Hindu Kush x Skunk #1
Notes: Dense lime green nugs with some coloration and medium amount of hairs. Reeks of skunk and some spicy pungency. Quick onset with large amount of euphoria, calm, and introspected happiness. Great for anxiety and depression. Music is involving and movies seem like a good idea. A light body buzz is present but not overwhelmin...â€
â€œVery enjoyable and smooth... slight hunger, dry mouth/eyes.  Would keep this one in the rotation!â€
â€œThis is an amazing strain. Can't wait to smoke more tomorrow!â€
â€œIt is very soothing ğŸ˜Œâ€
â€œNice earthy smell, potent high, smooth flavor. You feel one with the world around youâ€

â€œThe best description I can give for Hindu Skunk would be similar to the taste of sweet, blue flavored rock candy with a hint of earthiness all rolled into 1. The nugs are dense with various  lime green colors and a light orange hue coming from the pistils. This strain works well for both day & nighttime users. The smell of H.K. is not crazy strong, so luckily your able to carry your meds around where ever you go.  Pe...â€

â€œNamaste! Iâ€™ve always been drawn to the Hindu way of life, particularly the enlightenment, self realization, yoga, and Om-ness of it all.  So Hindu Skunk had me excited to go on my spiritual journey via a sampling of gorgeous nugs.  The buds are as pretty and green as the lush jungles of India, and have an odor thatâ€™s very light but noticeable, so donâ€™t think this will stink up your house, even with Skunk in the name....â€
